Heat oil in a medium size heavy saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the onions, and saute for 10 minutes. Stir in the bacon and garlic, and saute for 5 minutes more. Stir in the tomatoes, sugar and wine. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serving Ideas : Serve over vermicelli or spaghetti, with grated Romano.
